summary: I think this makes the running with a bow better
descriptionHtml:
I think this is better, i know when i run with my bow during archery i don\'t run like an ape and who would want to (as much as some people might like that >.>) 

No credit to me here all i did was re-name different animations so they replaced the vanilla bow running gorilla wanna be run.

I only just got a modeling/animation package so no idea how to use it yet, if anyone wants to help me there, id be most grateful as would love to make armour etc. I\'m sure there some tutorials out there though XD.

[edit] i forgot to say, extract this to your \"...\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\" folder.

Additional, 
Thanks for Saiodin who featured this mod in his skyrim mod bideo as per below :

[youtube]mnuIYBOMATE[/youtube]

Thanks hun XD


Thanks again and i hope it helps XD
author: origional authors - bethesda
